}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===FCC Doc=== Keeping with convention.. *PD97265NG is likely the general use 7265 FCC ID *PD97265NGU is likely the vendor-locked 7265 FCC ID *MSQ7265NG - Model: 7265NGW (NGFF 2230, key A+E) :Chip: iÂ©12; W410AK05; SR1U5; (76-pin?) :PCB: PB#H35123-001; StP2 CO NGFF; 4L TF6; :OUI: 60:57:18 (Intel Corporate)
The antenna connectors used are presumed to be of MHF type..
